    • getAllCrossAppAccessConnectionsPaged

      public Iterable<OrgCrossAppAccessConnection> getAllCrossAppAccessConnectionsPaged(String appId, String after, Integer limit)
      Retrieve all Cross App Access connections (Paginated) Retrieves inbound and outbound Cross App Access connections associated with an app This method returns a lazy, paginated iterable that automatically handles pagination. It is thread-safe and does not cause memory leaks. Use this method in a for-each loop to automatically fetch all pages without manual cursor management.
      Parameters:
      appId - Application ID (required)
      after - Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of connection results (optional)
      limit - Specifies the number of results to return per page. The values: * -1: Return all results (up to system maximum) * 0: Return an empty result set * Positive integer: Return up to that many results (capped at system maximum) (optional, default to -1)
      Returns:
      Iterable<OrgCrossAppAccessConnection> lazy iterable over all pages

    • getAllCrossAppAccessConnectionsPaged

      public Iterable<OrgCrossAppAccessConnection> getAllCrossAppAccessConnectionsPaged(String appId, String after, Integer limit, Map<String,String> additionalHeaders)
      Retrieve all Cross App Access connections (Paginated with additional headers) Retrieves inbound and outbound Cross App Access connections associated with an app This method returns a lazy, paginated iterable that automatically handles pagination. It is thread-safe and does not cause memory leaks.
      Parameters:
      appId - Application ID (required)
      after - Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of connection results (optional)
      limit - Specifies the number of results to return per page. The values: * -1: Return all results (up to system maximum) * 0: Return an empty result set * Positive integer: Return up to that many results (capped at system maximum) (optional, default to -1)
      additionalHeaders - additional headers for this call
      Returns:
      Iterable<OrgCrossAppAccessConnection> lazy iterable over all pages
